vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πολῠτῑμ-ος, ον,
(τιμή) much-revered, θεοί [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II highly priced, μουσοεργός [Refs 5th c.BC+]; very costly, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]. adverb -μως[Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: expensive, of great worth, costly valuable
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
expensive, of great worth, costly valuable
of great price, costly, precious, Mt. 13:46; Jn. 12:3; 1Pet. 1:7*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: caro, costoso ; de gran valor, muy valioso
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 非常有價值的, 價格昂貴的 (太 13:46; 約 12:3; 彼前 1:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 非常有价值的, 价格昂贵的 (太 13:46; 约 12:3; 彼前 1:7)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nhiều giá trị; quý giá (lớn). πολύς (G4183) + τιμή (G5092)
